thread.title: Donald Trump Has His Own Theory on What Happened at the Oscars
thread.title_full: Donald Trump Has His Own Theory on What Happened at the Oscars

author: Diana Bruk
title: Donald Trump Has His Own Theory on What Happened at the Oscars
text:
One of the funniest stunts pulled by host Jimmy Kimmel at the Academy Awards last night was a tweet that he legit sent to Donald Trump live from stage:
Hey @realDonaldTrump u up?
— Jimmy Kimmel (@jimmykimmel) February 27, 2017
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Trump never responded to the tweet, or commented on the Oscars on Twitter, though he did rail against the New York Times ad that aired on ABC during the show.
For first time the failing @nytimes will take an ad (a bad one) to help save its failing reputation. Try reporting accurately & fairly!
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 26, 2017
